text: Vittorio Mancini (born 24 July 1936) is a Sammarinese wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle bantamweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Sammarinese male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of San Marino Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics
title: Vittorio Mancini (wrestler)
